FuncDef: This command configures the mapping of a class-forwarding policy and forwarding set ID to a RSVP-TE LSP or to a RSVP-TE LSP auto-LSP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the class forwarding policy, to a maximum of 32 characters.
Specifies the class forwarding set. Values-1 to 4 (in system profile None/A).
